https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dcvSLAGi5MczuaJqhoOcxpVxcBF.jpg What could be better than knowing your future? And what could be worse? A love-filled childhood abruptly ends when catastrophe descends. A catastrophe that the child had foreseen yet failed to act upon. Cold Light
